1. Select a category:
- When the game starts, you can choose from different categories such as History, Science, Entertainment, Sports, and more. Select one and a questions round will begin.

 2. Answer the questions:
- Each category contains a set of questions.
- Read each one carefully and select from the provided possible answers the one you think is correct.

 3. Use your wild card:
- If you encounter a hard question or simply don't know the answer to it, you can use a wild card.
- The wild card allows you to change the current question by a different one from the same category.
- You have only one wild card per category, so use it wisely.

 4. Win points and move forward:
- For every correct answer, you'll win points that get accumulated for the entire game.
- Try to answer to every question correctly to get the maximum possible points and be the best QuizMaster.
